data.fullContent: The album was noted for its psychedelic feel, and "Who Feels Love?" was the best example of this. Mark Stent was praised for his production on the song, creating a `` trippy '' feel like that found on Beatles songs such as `` Rain ''. With the psychedelic and Eastern sound, the song also reminds of George Harrison achievements like "Within You Without You" and also some of his solo work.
data.answer: 这张专辑以迷幻的感觉而著称，《谁能感受到爱?》就是最好的例子。马克·斯坦特因他在这首歌中的表现而受到好评，他创造了一种“迷幻”的感觉，就像披头士乐队的歌曲《雨》一样。伴随着迷幻和东方的声音，这首歌也让人想起乔治·哈里森的成就，比如《Within You Without You》，以及他的一些独唱作品。
